alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New London and Middlesex Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Glastonbury to near Killingworth. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, New London, Colchester, Clinton, East Hampton, Groton, Old Saybrook, Salem, Chester, Mystic, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard and Griswold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London
